title: My account got hacked and someone got me permanently banned
body: can i get help with this someone hacked my account and got it permanently banned i just got the new password too

replies.body: Yeah, I agree that putting in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) would be a solid plan.  Our Player Behavior team can take a look into this with you individually to see what's up.  Hang tight!
Write a ticket to the Riot games support.
